topic.title: Existence Of Known Drug Allergy Observation - conformance rules

section.p: Indicator of whether patient has any allergies or sensitivities to drugs

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11498 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.102"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11213)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11663)/@code="67794-8" Does the patient have any medication allergies NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10203)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="BL" (CONF:10204)
If NEMSIS EHistory.06 is "No Known Drug Allergies," the value should be FALSE. If it is a proper value, the value should be TRUE. If it is a flavor of null, the appropriate flavor should be used here. See the null table to translate NEMSIS flavors into HL7; original values may be stored in Observation.text.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11213)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11663)/@code="67794-8" Does the patient have any medication allergies NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10203)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="BL" (CONF:10204)
If NEMSIS EHistory.06 is "No Known Drug Allergies," the value should be FALSE. If it is a proper value, the value should be TRUE. If it is a flavor of null, the appropriate flavor should be used here. See the null table to translate NEMSIS flavors into HL7; original values may be stored in Observation.text.
